item.description: Come on...Let's go celebrate us in Worcester! Starts around 12 noon. This event is held on Water and Harrison in Worcester. There are some Venders and a beer garden. Some stuff for the kids also. Places to hang out and socialize and have a bite to eat. I spoke with a very nice women (Maria) who is on the pride planning board-If you have any questions it's okay to call her-508-757-5596. Let's meet-up in Worcester!!!
item.how_to_find_us: I'll be wearing one of my doggies rainbow bandanas

group.name: WEST OF BOSTON OVER 40 GAY WOMENS MEET-UP

item.name: Worcester Gay Pride
